title: Moufu Oneesan no Atatamekata
original_name: 毛布おねえさんの温めかた
sinopse:
"I'm a god with a blanket that was born to warm you up."

On a certain day of winter, Minato, a boy who's particularly sensitive to cold, will meet a mysterious woman that will warm his heart to the core!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
